Topic.Title: Tegra 2 - new design win

Message.Msg: Do you think NV is sitting on its hands? CES in Jan.....

Topic.Title: Tegra 2 - new design win

Message.Msg: Having failed -- and Failed Badly -- in the adult cellphone market, -- where nvidia has only a mini-scule 00.90% market share -- current CEO Jen is now forced to try to make a buck elsewhere. Let's take a look, shall we? The nabi™ Jr Baby Monitor -- featuring the obsolete Tegra® dual-core processor "Enjoy the peace of mind with the nabi Jr. wireless video baby monitor. The video monitor comes with a camera to let you keep watch over your baby. The parent unit is your nabi Jr. 5-inch, high-resolution tablet, and the zoom function offers convenient use. Infrared night vision lets you keep an eye on your little one, even in low-light conditions, and the high-sensitivity microphone allows for two-way communication. The monitor features an out-of-range alert." A technical note on the nabi™ Jr Baby Monitor -- featuring the obsolete Tegra® 2 dual-core processor. It would seem that the person using the nabi™ Jr Baby Monitor device maybe hasn't done such a great job of, well, monitoring -- if the adult-monitor needs an alert that the baby-monitoree has crawled "out-of-range" of the tegra 2 powered nabi™. And how does the baby-monitoree make an "out-of-range" escape anyway? Rides Ruff the family dog out the door and down the street? Yelling "Go Ruff -- Go!" While the baby-monitoree is obliviously watching football and eating Cheetos®? Looks like another desperate attempt to make something -- anything -- with those obsolete tegra 2 chips. Like that tegra 2 powered Female Mosquito Laser Zapper device, right boys?

Message.Title: Looks Like AMD is Going To Go Belly-UP
Message.Msg: AMD is going to pay Global Foundries $320M so they don't have to take wafers. Don't think the graphics division's near break even operating income is going to support 10,000 employees and Rory Reed and the Chairman's salary and bonuses. Sad Day for AMD

Topic.Title: Wayne news: HTC to be the first with NVIDIA Tegra 4 phone?

Message.Msg: Tegra no match for ARM A5 no wonder MSFT is switching. Nvda behind the curve, again. What's an A15 you ask? That's the next chip design -- officially the Cortex A15 -- from tablet and smartphone chip design powerhouse ARM. Think of it this way: Four A15s are faster than the four Nvidia Tegra 3 Cortex-A9s now found in the Asus Transformer Prime. And the Transformer Prime is already pretty fast for a tablet. (Technically, Nvidia calls its quad-core Tegra 4-Plus-1 because there's a fifth battery-life-friendly core for less-demanding tasks.)

Topic.Title: Wayne news: HTC to be the first with NVIDIA Tegra 4 phone?

Message.Msg: Someone is perpetuating a lie here . . there is no support for Microsoft switching from Tegra. They have setup a whole lineup of manufacturers to use ARM and Qualcomm's was delayed due to their Snapdragon chip not meeting certification requirements yet. They will have a Windows ARM based tablet coming out but it does NOT mean Tegra is out of the Surface at all. This misinformation is just the kind of thing that deserves litigation in my opinion.

Topic.Title: Wayne news: HTC to be the first with NVIDIA Tegra 4 phone?

Message.Msg: Surface RT is dead. Windows on ARM is a dog.

Topic.Title: Another Tegra 3 Phone In China

Message.Msg: I really like this news, but it's actually old (first published in November I think). A more updated news is that another ZTE tegra 3 phone called U950 sold more than 0.5 million during pre-order. ZTE U950 was the first quad-core phone sold under 1000 RMB in China.
